openerSection: SBI Unnati credit card, a secured credit card offered by the SBI Card. The SBI Unnati credit card is given to customers with a Fixed term deposit of Rs 25,000 or above with the State Bank of India. For every transaction of Rs. 100 done using the SBI Unnati credit card you earn 1 reward point. With this SBI Unnati credit card, you earn a milestone advantage of Rs 500 cashback if you spend Rs 50,000 or above in a year. Also, a waiver on the annual fee is provided for up to 4 years from the date of card issuance. To know more about the SBI Unnati Credit card, keep reading.
andThereIsMore: No Annual Charges (For first four years)
1 Reward Point per Rs 100 you spend
Rs 500 cashback on annual spending of Rs 50,000 within 15 days
1% surcharge waiver applicable on fuel transactions above Rs. 500 (below Rs. 4,000).

rewardsPoints: 1 Reward Point per Rs 100 you spend

Rewards Rate: 1 reward point per Rs 100 you spend
Reward Redemption: 1 RP = Rs 0.25 on redemption against a host of gifts and benefits at the SBI Card rewards catalog.

Fuel Surcharge: 1% surcharge waiver on all fuel purchases using the SBI Unnati credit card
Cash Advance Charge: 2.5% on the amount withdrawn subject to a minimum charge of Rs. 500
